nodes.text: The Haserian sector was a Mid Rim sector located along the Reena Trade Route. Two systems—Monastery and Haseria lay along the route. The territory was first explored between 20,000 BBY and 15,000 BBY, when the settlement of the Trailing Sectors began and the Corellian Run was expanded nearly to Ryloth.
Along the Reena Trade Route, the average planetary population was 100 million to 500 million circa 25 ABY, while this number dropped to 10 million to 100 million in the other areas of the sector.
